name: Avegant Corp.
description: Developer of light field display technology designed for mixed-reality applications. The company's platform offers displays that can enable the visualization of virtual objects across multiple focal planes, replicating the way to view natural objects and enhancing the artificial intelligence journey, enabling users to change how people learn, play, work, and interact with each other through augmented reality experiences.
one_liner: Developer of light field display technology designed for mixed-reality applications. The company's platform offers displays that can enable the visualization of virtual objects across multiple focal planes, replicating the way to view natural objects and enhancing the artificial intelligence journey, enabling users to change how people learn, play, work, and interact with each other through augmented reality experiences.
